General.Name: Dinamik Isi Makina Yalitim Malzemeleri Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Dinamik Isi Makina Yalitim Malzemeleri Sanayi Ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi engages in the manufacture and sale of insulation, HVAC, packaging, industrial foam, and furniture forming products in Turkey. The company offers thermal insulation, NPE-polyethylene, rubber, crosslinked polyethylene sheet, valve jacket, glass wool, rock wool, ceramic wool, acoustic and sound insulation, and auxiliary products; HVAC products, such as ventilation elements, fans, flexible air ducts, Anemostat and Louver connectors, and flow adjustment dampers; and packaging products, including packaging profiles, corner protectors, mattresses, sheets, special design, and entertainment and sports products. It also provides industrial foam products, which include foam tapes, rubber priducts, and special cut products; and furniture foaming products comprising high and low density flooring profiles, and high density flooring wicks. The company was incorporated in 1991 and is headquartered in Izmir, Turkey.
